mng: to sprout, to bud, to have a strong affection for (slang), adorable (loanword from Japanese 萌え moe, slang describing affection for a cute character)

exm.mng: to sprout, to bud, to have a strong affection for (slang), adorable (loanword from Japanese 萌え moe, slang describing affection for a cute character)
to sprout (lit. or fig.), to bud, to germinate, germ, seed, bud
to burgeon, to produce, to conceive, to be in the initial stage
to sprout, to shoot, to bud
Mengzhu mountain range between south Hunan and Guangxi
to prevent a disaster before the event (idiom); to nip sth in the bud
see 故態復萌|故态复萌[gu4 tai4 fu4 meng2]
